Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign with minimalist CS-inspired aesthetic

Transformed from cyberpunk/neon to clean minimalist design with subtle computer science visual elements:

- Color palette: Replaced 4+ neon colors with monochrome + single muted slate-blue accent
- Removed heavy animations \(typing, parallax, glow, pulse\) - kept only essential fades
- Simplified layouts: 6-col skills grid → 2-col, masonry experience → single-column
- Added CS-inspired elements: graph node bullets, subtle corner brackets
- Updated all components and pages with consistent minimal styling
- Net reduction of 250 lines for cleaner codebase

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/School/WebstormProjects/resume add package.json package-lock.json vite.config.ts src/mdx.d.ts src/content/ src/components/BlogCard.tsx src/components/MDXComponents.tsx src/pages/BlogPost.tsx src/App.tsx src/pages/Portfolio.tsx src/data/workData.ts)
Bash(git -C /Users/School/WebstormProjects/resume commit -m "Add MDX-based blog system with dedicated post pages")
